locations.name: Melbourne
locations.description: Australia's 'capital of cool', known for its laneway culture, street art, coffee scene, and vibrant atmosphere.

locations.name: Hamilton Island
locations.description: An island paradise in the Whitsundays, offering direct access to the Great Barrier Reef and iconic Whitehaven Beach.

locations.name: Sydney
locations.description: Iconic global city famed for its Opera House, Harbour Bridge, beautiful beaches like Bondi, and vibrant neighbourhoods.

locations.name: Bouddi Peninsula
locations.description: A serene coastal escape near Sydney, featuring stunning national park walks, secluded beaches, and peaceful natural beauty.
